body: Add Get-Variable Pester Unit Test @andschwa please help to merge this to master, thank you! --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/807)

comments.body:
@JamesWTruher I have fixed the comments, could you help to merge to master? thank you!
I don't know why "continuous-integration/travis-ci/push  — The Travis CI build failed " failed, the code works on my Linux and Windows box.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I'll rebase this into master. The xUnit test runner stopped working and I had to temporarily disable it.
